website_summaries.verdict: These heavy-duty polycarbonate rings are textured to prevent sweaty hands from slipping.
pros: Textured rings are comfortable and do not bruise hands
Velcro fittings  store extra strap length
cons: Buckles occasionally fail, so be sure to test before using

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these. Both of metal ring holders  snapped in half after my third ring muscle up
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these. Both of them snapped in half after my third ring muscle up.I am very shaken up right now. Both my daughter and I use these rings. I am lucky it didn’t snap off and I didn’t fall from the top position. I am very shaken up right now. Both my daughter and I use these rings. I am lucky it didn’t snap off and fall from the top position. In all the years I have been cross fitting I have never had anything like this happen to me. I can’t tell you how upset I am right now. They need to recall these rings immediately !
customer_reviews.author: robert fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rings for the novice or experienced alike!
customer_reviews.text: These rings are strong and well made. The rings are made of plastic with a roughened surface that's easy on the hands and keeps them from slipping when they're moist from sweat. The web clamp is easily adjustable for changing between various exercises in just moments. I like the color, because they will get dirty and this will make it less obvious. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Raider

customer_reviews.title: This was an awesome purchase! Super cheap and high quality
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome purchase! Super cheap and high quality, durable and a great work out! This is better than TRX straps because of their durability. I am a volunteer firefighter, Team Roper, and exercise enthusiast and this puts ripped on a different level!
customer_reviews.author: Pickle Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality-Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I use to CrossFit and then moved to a Fitness Center, but they did not have rings to use. I purchased the Elite Gymnastic Rings so I could continue to do some of the CrossFit movements (ring rows, ring push ups, ring muscle ups, etc). The ones at my former CrossFit Box used wooden ones so I was a little apprehensive buying these. AMAZING! The texture is very comfortable in the hand, there is no slip, The strap system is easy to use. Thank you for such a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna B

customer_reviews.title: Poor hinges
customer_reviews.text: The non slip hinge or whatever it is called is pretty poorly made. One of them is working correctly, and is actually still kind of awkward to use and adjust. The other is broken completely, and won't hold weight at all. Since one is working I can tell how they are supposed to be set up, and it appears in the broken one the little spring was either installed backwards or slipped out completely. Since the hinges are riveted I can't take it apart to try and fix it either. Currently I just have the broken one tied up with knots to hold it. That makes adjustment pretty much impossible, so you better only be using these at one level.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Dever

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a major part of my fitness regime since receiving it months ago. Very strong, sturdy and solid. I have no complaints. Straps are tough and have never given trouble. Just be very mindful to hook straps through as shown in instruction. This is very important. I use them on bars in the park and on a beam at home. Has greatly helped in increasing my upper body strength and core strength. I can't believe I have only now discovered the joys of Ring exercises. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Xan

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nice finishing touches!
customer_reviews.text: I got these today and put them up quickly. These are very rugged, well-built rings! I'm particularly impressed with the finishing touches... Nice velcro storage straps, sealed edges on the straps themselves and high-quality adjustment buckles. (In my picture, the Velcro straps you see just above the rings are not being used to hold the rings; they just happened to be in the picture and are not used in any way to secure the rings!) I would say that I would buy these again, but I don't think I will ever have to! Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Dag

customer_reviews.title: Buckles break in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these at the end of July 2017, one of the buckled just snapped off while I was using them. Unsure about what I can do, since I cannot return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Greulich

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I am just getting into calisthenics and these rings are perfect. I have never used rings before, but these work great and are well made. Never knew how much of a workout you could get from just the rings alone. They also come with a jump rope which I did not notice was included in the description, but was surly a please tell surprise. Overall they are a great buy for the price. I imagine there are high end rings, but these do the job for what I, and probably most people similar to me would need them for.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Purpose Rings
customer_reviews.text: Our second purchase which we hung in our house for our children to use. They LOVE them and unexpectedly, the toddler has been finding many creative ways to challenge himself while playing with the rings. These rings have more uses than we ever expected. By the way, these rings help keep obesity at bay in this household of several children.
customer_reviews.author: ALASKAN PONIES

customer_reviews.title: The straps and hitches feel very secure and are easily adjustable for different lengths
customer_reviews.text: The rings feel very durable and there is some texture on them for grip I assume. I could see how some people might find the texture too rough, but you can always use athletic tape on them. The straps and hitches feel very secure and are easily adjustable for different lengths. I hang these from the pull up bar of my squat rack and they hold my weight very well (180 lb). I have tested them with dips and push ups and they are very stable (excluding my wobbly arms). The jump rope is a nice bonus and I highly recommend this set for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lin

customer_reviews.title: These rings work great for our grandkids
customer_reviews.text: These rings work great for our grandkids. We put them up when the old plastic tire swing finally gave out. We hung the rings from a tree branch at just the right height for the kids (7-9-11) to reach up, or jump up, and grab. They are strong and feel good on the hands. We might have had to adjust the buckling system on them a bit when we put them up... it seems like we had to invent a fix, but it was small and I don't remember now.
customer_reviews.author: Angie A

customer_reviews.title: Add gym rings to your workout, well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to my workout. Rings are sturdy, well made, and comfortable. The ring straps are made of heavy duty nylon and long enough to reach from the pull-up bar on my garage ceiling to the floor. I actually trimmed the excess webbing but there are Velcro straps to hold the excess in place if you don't want to cut it. I weigh 190lbs and the metal adjustable clips have never slipped and adjusting them is easy. They also throw in a nice jump rope. Value for price definitely five stars. Look at the web site and on-line for the number of exercises you can do with your gym rings, worth adding to your workout routine.
customer_reviews.author: Philip L

customer_reviews.title: They have a nice grip, and you're never worried whether the buckle ...
customer_reviews.text: As a first time user and buyer of Gymnastics rings I was impressed with the ease of set-up and the quality of these rings. They have a nice grip, and you're never worried whether the buckle will break or not. The jump-rope was a nice touch. The only thing I could say to improve upon would maybe be to have a small instruction booklet with some basic exercises or a clearer guide on how to set up the rings. I was able to thread them with ease, but had to youtube how to set them up, as it wasn't clear you had to rope the string over your hanging bar first. Overall, solid product, does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Love Them for Workout and Fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these. We originally bought them because we setup a home gym and thought these would be great for our workouts. But in the end these have become my 2 year old daughter's favorite! She loves to swing on them and hang. It is so cute. Easy to use and adjust with the straps and the rings are good quality. For the price it has been worth the buy. [...]
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Solid. perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I'm just over 200 lbs and these things don't even notice I'm on them. Good grip. If I were to need another I wouldn't hesitate to get these same ones. I like the gray color, and the straps so far have worked great, it's easy to quickly adjust for a pull up or dip position. I have them hanging on a pull up rack for my 9 year old to easily be able to grab as well. Honestly I expect them to last and I will probably never need another pair.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: These rings are well-made and sturdy. The instructions could be a little more detailed
customer_reviews.text: These rings are well-made and sturdy. The instructions could be a little more detailed, but it doesn't take much to figure it out on your own. You just have to be sure to squeeze the clasp down on the strap firmly or it doesn't grab and the straps slip. Once you've squeezed them tight, they hold firm and secure. We bought them with two purposes in mind...one for my husband and I to use for workouts and two..for our daughter to play on. They are great for both purposes. We are all very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: shellym143

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my home gym
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in the early stages of Covid-19 pandemic and I use it for many movements. I comes in handy as well for traveling. Nice sturdy rings and I particularly like the textured feel of the rings to aid in non-slippage in your grip.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: They price was great but it was money almost completely down the drain ...
customer_reviews.text: The clamps that hold the webbing don't hold, I.E. you can't set the height without then tying several knots in the webbing to keep the rings from slipping. I have had these for over 6 months now and sadly wish I had purchased a higher quality. They price was great but it was money almost completely down the drain since I don't use them (only because they are a pain in the neck to adjust)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Careful with straps,  locking metal is weak
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful when lacing the straps. Instructions on the locking mechanism are not specific about strap routing path...and the metal used in the locking mechanism is prone to failure. Otherwise my kids and I thoroughly enjoyed using this daily.
customer_reviews.author: 6'3" Monster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, I have been using these rings for a little less than a month now on a day to day basis. They are an awesome addition to my home gym and were very easy to use. Set up was a breeze and they are easy to adjust to different height levels. I was excited to also receive a free jump rope with my rings which was a nice surprise, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chyrl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rings
customer_reviews.text: These rings are very well made, I love the textured grips which allow me to use them without gloves. The straps also seem to be heavy duty and should hold up well over time. The ‘bonus’ jump rope is low quality plastic but fine to use as a back up to my high end rope, it was an extra so hard to complain.
customer_reviews.author: M Recoon

customer_reviews.title: Level up your home gym!
customer_reviews.text: Added these to my pull-up tower and they definitely made a significant difference in my calisthenics workouts. I also bought different add-on handles to strap my feet in for trx workouts. So versatile, simple, and effective. Awesome stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford W. Lew

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great workout
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great deal! Don't waste your money on a suspension trainer, these can be used for the same exercises and more. Plus, this was the best deal I could find on Amazon for rings and they're really durable- have used them the whole summer, both inside and outside from trees, and the straps and rings are still in great shape. I'm a certified personal trainer and I would recommend these to any of my clients that want to workout at home or outside!
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Anywhere

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CALESTHENIC EQUIPMENT!
customer_reviews.text: The best piece of workout equipment I have ever bought. It is so versatile and portable! I wish something could be done with the end of the strap to make it easier to thread it through the buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Use these off and on for pull ups, inverted rows and dips. Easy to adjust and hang from an exposed beam in my garage. No issues with the buckles, straps, or rings. I don’t use the jump rope too often but could tell it wouldn’t last a long time. It’s soft rubber/plastic.
customer_reviews.author: CK1

customer_reviews.title: My most useful purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Well, Buying this was one of my best purchases I have made for myself. Tutorials and sample workout routines are everywhere on line. Pick one and get ready to see a great improvement of strength. The rings are sturdy and do not flex, bend, or feel chintzy. The straps are professional, the clasp is industrial. I put these things through some hell and not one component is showing wear. The length of the straps can accommodate any type of height you throw at it. ANY. Get them, prepare to engage all those muscles you forgot about.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: First-rate rings
customer_reviews.text: Good hardware, secure straps and a good texture to the rings make these a smart choice. I will never be a gymnast but the ability to perform some of my workout routine on rings where I have to recruit additional muscles for position stabilization is beneficial. Anyway, if you are looking for a set of rings these should be at the top of your list.
customer_reviews.author: JDS

customer_reviews.title: Good Shot Elite!
customer_reviews.text: A month after the return window closed, one of the buckles defected. Really like the product, but now i can't use them. Having trouble using the email service to exercise their 100% guarantee, but maybe that is my error. Hopefully the folks at Elite see this review and make it right. UPDATE EDIT: Elite Sports came through with the Customer Service and the 100 % Satisfaction. Almost immediately after posting the above review, Elite reached out to me to see what happened and how to make it right. Within a few days i received the replacement gear. Thank you Elite, you guys will now be my go to for fitness gear!
customer_reviews.author: kavin

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, should last
customer_reviews.text: The straps are strong, as are the buckles that hold them and the rings are sturdy. My only complaint is that they are too smooth for my bare feet to stay in well when I am using them for TRX type exercise, but they are fine if I am wearing shoes. My son, on the other hand, uses them for pull-ups and has had no complaints with how they feel on his hands. Overall, better quality than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: maxalbec

customer_reviews.title: One Achilles heal.
customer_reviews.text: Great rings. Unfortunately if the metal piece touches the rings while it is beating your body weight they will break off. This happened on both sides to me. However if you are careful this won’t happen. Other than that a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Really great value
customer_reviews.text: I went with the Elite Sportz Gymnastics Rings mainly for cost reasons. Overall I am very happy with them. I am not a hardcore user, I'm 46 with slightly better than average build looking to prove strength and agility. I looked into door frame pull up bars but most seem prone to slippage and/or can cause damage to the door frame. In 3 weeks I went from doing 2 pull up max to hitting 10 max just yesterday. I am now experimenting with varying ring heights with the hopes of being able to do Archer and Typewriter pull ups in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Kiet Vuong

customer_reviews.title: Defective product, sub quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: Both buckles broke. One during the second day of light usage. Sencond buckle a couple of days after.
customer_reviews.author: Guayabero

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are hard to beat. I was able to hang them up quickly and easily and the straps lock well. I have to say I am very pleased so far. I like these as well as the wooden rings, and the included jump rope was surprisingly decent quality as well. If you are looking for something to try out and are new to using rings but don't want to spend a ton of money, give these a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Blackout1500

customer_reviews.title: Swinging for fun
customer_reviews.text: What no one says about this kind of equipment is that it is a lot more difficult to do pull ups using these rings than using a regular bar. They seem to be solid and hold well after working out on them for couple of days only. But like I said, if you are not very good at pull ups you might find it impossible to do any work out with these except for swinging for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Followed to death

customer_reviews.title: Good rings
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these rings for the past couple of months. They work as expected, easy to install and set-up. Skipping rope a plus. In my view, gymnastic rings are the best fitness tool available: cheap and much more effective than any other fitness equipment.
customer_reviews.author: UG

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! Dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: The clip broke on my 3rd Workout. Thankfully I had a hold on the other ring but this was extremely dangerous. The Spring inside the Clamp that holds everything popped off and whats even worse is that it doesn't even seem like it can be repaired. It is utter garbage and I hate the fact I spent money on a product I barely even got to use. It would be one thing if it broke after a year or so but it was a few workouts and done.. What type of durability testing did this go through?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, useful, and best priced
customer_reviews.text: Love these rings to practice ring dips, push ups, pull ups etc. These rings are very strong and sturdy and go over our over-the-door pull-up bar for in-home exercises. My young kids also love to hang on them and thus get some of their muscles moving....always much better than watching movies on cold days. Overall, we really loved this set and can't beat the value for the price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kanishk

customer_reviews.title: Best for what you pay for every penny worth it
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect if you want quality at the price per dollar Here are some of my observations If your palm have the tendency of getting hard and skin getting some scales than you have get some extra plam grips to make you more comfortable. Instructions are good and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: They seem pretty strong, I'm 230 pounds and they haven't broken ...
customer_reviews.text: I have these set up in my backyard and they work very well. They seem pretty strong, I'm 230 pounds and they haven't broken or frayed from all the workouts I've done. The buckles are well made and don't slip.
customer_reviews.author: randir14

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says, I have noticed after a month or so that the teeth on the brackets are starting to "eat" at the material. Nothing to bad, but it is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: AlanH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rings at great price!
customer_reviews.text: These rings are exactly as advertised and the best-priced pair on Amazon at the time. The clips are a tiny bit difficult to get started the correct way initially (nice photo to demonstrate proper insertion), but once they are, they hold perfectly & are super easy to adjust. The free jump rope is ok, but the bearings in the handles don't turn as freely as higher quality ropes I've used, & the "rope" is fairly cheap plastic that doesn't want to unkink even after hanging from its midpoint in a warm room for several days. But it was free, so I really can't knock it too much.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gravitt

customer_reviews.title: Stable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The rings are very sturdy and have a slip resistent texture. The straps are very strong and easy to adjust. We bought this to use as a tool to increase our upper body and core strength.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my workout equipment!
customer_reviews.text: These rings are great. After CORRECTLY threading the straps, this product securely holds me up with ease (I weigh 175lb). I love the fact that you can do multiple exercises with them, and they offer an unconventional way of strengthening your body. I haven't used the jump rope since that wasn't what I mainly wanted to buy, but it comes with a jump rope too. Yes I would buy these again, and I'd definitely recommend them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Leland White

customer_reviews.title: Good for Workout or Gymnastics - Sturdy and Non slip grip
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that was strong enough for me to use for workouts but that the could climb on or use for gymnastics play. I these for Ring rows or ring pull ups, my kids use them as gymnastic rings for climbing and playing. You can put them anywhere. They are strong, sturdy, they have long and adjustable straps and no slip gripping.
customer_reviews.author: Monica_dawn

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Recently received these and at first I was a bit apprehensive about the quality because of the price. Fear not, these things are great so far. I'm so happy there is a company out there designing and selling fitness equipment that isn't gouging the customer. My clients love these rings and I've been able to support bodyweights of over 200lbs. Not to mention, the jump rope that came as an added bonus has been great too.Thank you Elite Sportz!
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite birthday present!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rings! My kids love them (even though they are for adults) my little ring junky loves them!!! Surely her favorite birthday present! I've used them too :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Far more versatile than TRX
customer_reviews.text: Does everything an expensive TRX kit can do and so much more. Rings will give even those in an advanced stage of fitness DOMS like they haven't experienced since they first hit the gym.
customer_reviews.author: aerich

customer_reviews.title: I really love having these for my workouts!
customer_reviews.text: If you're a bodybuilder or just a calisthenics person then this is the perfect addition to your routine. The rings definitely have more of a stabilizing factor which can make things that are typically easier on a bar much harder. Try em with pullups, decline pushups, rows, dips, or whatever you can imagine! Note to vendor: Try reinforcing the tip of the rope that gets fed into the latch with a less flexible material. Sometimes it can take me a few minutes to finally get it to cooperate.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!! DANGEROUS!! Clamp broke after 1 week use
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to install this in our backyard for some in-home exercise during corona times. I've been using it for about a week when suddenly the metal clamp SNAPPED In half, and I almost broke my legs falling to the floor. I weigh about 150 lbs and followed the pamphlet installation instructions closely so didn't expect any problems, but to my dismay, it left my almost injured. DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercise while traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I got these so that I could work out while traveling abroad. I am not a primary ring user but it is a great alternative for lightweight exercise equipment that can be used for the entire body. Some of the main exercises I use them for are pull-ups, dips, push-ups, Rows, and assisted pistol squats. The Rings are very sturdy and the straps are very strong, if you are a recreational user of ring exercises then these will fit your needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very strong, durable, great quality rings. I highly recommend watching the youtube video to make sure you install the rings properly. If I didn't watch I probably would have threaded them the wrong way. I have only had them a couple days. I am so excited to add them into my toning routine. I hope to do a pull up someday.
customer_reviews.author: Mama of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Metal clip makes it difficult to eat the straps
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is perfect except for the clips. They are metal and its very hard to get the straps in, had to use a fork and took me nearly an entire hour to get just both straps in because it was so hard, very annoying
customer_reviews.author: seto-333

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These heavy-duty plastic rings are perfect. Ours are mounted outdoors in the Southwest,which is a tough climate, and plenty sturdy for that (wood deteriorates quickly!). Also, the clasps that hold the straps are VERY grippy/sturdy plus easy to adjust (follow the clear printed directions, plus arrows on the clasps, for threading the straps through the clasps the right way the first time). Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best rings for the price, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: As usual excellent Amazon experience with great delivery. The sellers communication was above expectation. I have used many Olympic rings over the last decade from wood to various plastic models and these are very heavy duty. Slightly more texture than I like but that's a matter of personal preference. Awesome quality, easy set up, and the best price on Amazon this is a no-brainer for anyone looking for rings for their garage or gym. Would buy again👍👍
customer_reviews.author: franklin357

customer_reviews.title: So cool. I use them at the local school playground ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted to experiment with working out using gymnastic rings but didn't want to go to a special gym to use them (since I'm only an amateur), and then I found out there are home versions that you can take with you anywhere! So cool. I use them at the local school playground when school's not in session to just play around with the rings and test my strength. It's great! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: amanpanman

customer_reviews.title: A great set of rings!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ring set. I was a little hesitant because the rings are plastic, and I imagined myself preferring wooden rings. That being said, these are really well built and feel sturdy in my hands. I've used them for a couple of weeks now, and can tell they will hold up really well. Also, my set came with a pretty nice jump rope for free. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Dew

customer_reviews.title: Great product, lacking customer service
customer_reviews.text: Only four stars because one strap came slightly frayed on the side. Still usable, but emailed seller since I would prefer one in "as advertised" condition like the other strap was. Has been 2 business days and still no response from seller. Other than this, phenomenal product. Excellent weight capabilities (not suggested, but just one strap/ring could support me @ 170lbs), and great videos on their website that I suggest watching. Plus a free jump rope is cool. All in all great deal, just wish I could have had both straps in equal condition.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality rings!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality rings, very solid and the straps and buckles are well made.... I think some people that had issues with the buckles may have fed the strap the wrong way overloading the buckles causing them to break... Just follow the assembly instructions and you should get great life out of the rings!
customer_reviews.author: Brad A Summers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good online video on use & setup
customer_reviews.text: First time using rings. Good quality, good online video on use & setup. Dips are much more challenging than on a dip bar (shouldn't be a surprise I guess!) Bonus: My 3 yr old son likes them too :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great rings
customer_reviews.text: These are the better rings I found on Amazon. I had purchased a similar product for a lesser price (did not include the free jump rope), but returned those because lesser quality. Have purchased two sets of these rings. Very happy. Absolutely no issues with the straps, I read the instructions first.
customer_reviews.author: Jill C.

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can do some exercising at home.
customer_reviews.text: I use an old quilt as a closet door. We reinforced that steel closet rod the quilt is on with longer screws. Works great! I can slide them to the side when not in use and the quilt hides the rings.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product and great quality. Hung in the garage and use for pull-ups, dips, planks, and pushups. The jump rope is good quality and is used regularly. Product arrived quickly and as advertised. Strongly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Great rings
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of more expensive wooden rings at my home. I wanted a second set of rings to be able to take with me to the fire station to work out but not be out a lot of money if I left them behind. These rings are just as durable and effective as my other rings that I spent 3x's the amount on. I would definitely recommend these rings.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Dean

customer_reviews.title: I love my rings
customer_reviews.text: I love my rings! I hung them higher for a while to hang and work on pull ups. Now they are lower so I can use them for rows. There's really so many options. They are sturdy, and the straps are easily adjustable. Sorry the pictures are sideways!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Look no further; these Gym Rings are all you need!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I haven't had much time to use them yet, I've already tried them once and they are extremely sturdy and well-made. Easy to assemble, with plenty of extra length for higher mounting capabilities! These rings are awesome, and the jump-rope is a great little extra freebie :) The rings have a nice diameter and weight to them, so you feel super secure; would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shea M Curry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I installed these at my office (we have steel beams over the drop ceiling) and they have been perfect. I am not a heavy guy though, so don't depend on my review if you weigh more than 150. I will say this, I wouldn't worry about anyone getting on them, the rings are solid and the straps and hardware stout.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Put these on the pull-up bars and the kids instantly ...
customer_reviews.text: Put these on the pull-up bars and the kids instantly became addicted. They seem to handle the weather well, I attached them to some kayak straps, so I can't comment on the quality of the straps. The kayak straps were a little easier to adjust on the fly, as the kids adjust them frequently on their routines.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great rings
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to my home gym. Rings are sturdy and non-slippery. It's very easy and fast to adjust them to certain height. Also, jumping rope with ball bearings in handles was a nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Great product, honestly.
customer_reviews.text: I don't use them much because I'm lazy, but when I do they work fantastic and they cost much less than what I would expect for something like this. The straps are well made and thick. The rings are very sturdy and feel great in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great value for first set of rings.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these rings. The straps and buckles are of excellent quality. You have to watch the videos about how to thread them correctly if you aren't sure. I can see why some folks might prefer wooden rings over these plastic ones. When I do dips and put my full bodyweight (180lbs) on the rings, I can feel the plastic give a little. For the price, these are an excellent value and I would recommend them to anyone. The included jump rope is very basic - not very usable for double unders, but hey it's free.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo Jones

customer_reviews.title: Impressive product
customer_reviews.text: Anyone having any trepidation about buying these because of your body weight, have no fear. I weigh 330lbs and have been doing ring dips and rows on these without any issues. Very sturdy product and an amazing deal for the price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good and Affordable Product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them much, just got them yesterday, but, they seem very sturdy, and the buckles work great.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Scott

customer_reviews.title: The Rings are a great way to do a full body workout plus core ...
customer_reviews.text: The Rings are a great way to do a full body workout plus core work all in one . I do a lot of weight lifting and just wanted to change up my routine ( I weigh in around 235 lbs ) . So don't think you need to be a gymnast or have a CrossFit background to purchase this product .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh... broke right after return period
customer_reviews.text: One day after the return period, the securing buckle snapped. Now I have a useless set
customer_reviews.author: Justin F.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Set Up
customer_reviews.text: The metal tab broke, and I fell down. The fabric is also so difficult to reattach it isn’t worth being portable. You will want to kill your self attempting to put it through the metal teeth. Works well when it’s set up, but you will be so upset when it finally is that you won’t want to work out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as TRX if you're not a pro
customer_reviews.text: well-made and reliable for all suspension-based workouts. I hang these from my pull-up bar and use them for push-ups, rows, and dips. Unbelivably cheap replacement for a TRX system.
customer_reviews.author: Durdell Hensdadt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as advertised, shipped promptly and were easy to hang in the barn. Bought these for our 7yo daughter who is in gymnastics to practice between training sessions. In one week of playing with her new rings at home her instructor said her ring skills had improved by three times and her general confidence in the gym was now through the roof and she was trying new skills she was hesitant to attempt before.
customer_reviews.author: pamela s wright

customer_reviews.title: Booty
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. Too early to tell how it's working. Only been 2 weeks since i stayed using it. High hopes though!
customer_reviews.author: Spidey Sense

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price point. They are getting heavy use in my garage gym. Great for dips, muscle-ups, and pullups. Very sturdy and easy to attach to a pullup bar or playground equipment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Yep. I love these. I recommend. Easy to set up and strong. I set up on a doorway pull-up bar and I haven't had any problems. Def changes the workout at home game.
customer_reviews.author: CoronaphyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to home gym
customer_reviews.text: These went up easily. The locking buckled stay in place very well. Adjust easily. I love having these in my gym!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Bond

customer_reviews.title: but glad I didn't
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality rings. I was originally thinking of trying to DIY my own, but glad I didn't. These are very durable and look like they will last a long time. Also, they are easy to assemble, and the online video was really helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Rings are a nice texture. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Rings are a nice texture. Sturdy, easy to set up. Arrived quickly. Using these for body weight workout exercises, not gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: 2Mutts

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I hung these from my door frame pullup bar and the set up feels very sturdy. I think the limiting factor is the weight the doorframe can hold. The straps are pretty long, I have a lot of excess left which is nice if I want to hang them from a higher point. I want sure what the quality of the jump rope would be, I mean it is included free, but it is very nice, at least for a beginner like me. I was also pleased with how easy it was to adjust it to the length I needed.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Indestructable Rings.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of bang for your buck. These rings feel great and are practically indestructible plastic. Very easy to set up and have a convenient velcro tab to roll up and keep the straps tidy. The straps are long enough for most any situation. The rings are the best equipment i have bought for strength and exercise, so hard and challenging with excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product. sturdy
customer_reviews.text: great product. sturdy. easy to set up. bought 2 sets. one for me and one for the kids. they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Sooknanan

customer_reviews.title: The rings themselves are quick and easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Before I even got my rings, which arrived in time, the sellers had already contacted me to make sure everything was just right, from the shipment to the product itself. They sent videos and a copy of an e-book to help me get started. The rings themselves are quick and easy to put up. I had no problems whatsoever. I love them! I would order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Terheyden

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 3 year old to help him release some energy and they are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Katie c

customer_reviews.title: Very good for trainings
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, allow me to do my ninja training and I am a big person (about 100kg)
customer_reviews.author: Niv S.

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Really good value for the price. I love these things already
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Really really worth the price I will be buying another set I have a set that cost me $85 and you can't tell a diffance between the two sets The straps held with no problems at all not one slip One strap held me and my wife which togather is over 300lbs Real easy to set up no problem there And it came with easy to read step by step Direction 5 stars really a great product Tones of fun for kids also
customer_reviews.author: pheanele brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality is above expected
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome!! Shocked for the price. Would buy more if I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: Thedude

customer_reviews.title: plastic rings feel bad when you are used to wood
customer_reviews.text: plastic rings feel bad when you are used to wood. Also a smaller diameter. Not exactly what I wanted, but my fault for not reading the description.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great rings
customer_reviews.text: Been a week now and these are great. Mounted them and they work as advertised! Nice texture on the rings, straps are great and will last. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T

customer_reviews.title: Great workout rings. Need height indicator on straps.
customer_reviews.text: Work great. No problems at all. Happy with the size and girth of the rings. Straps work well. I’d like it better if the straps had marks on them to more easily set the height of each ring.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my workouts
customer_reviews.text: Nice grip, good and hefty. I use mine with my chin-up bar to do vertical rows, and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: green_canary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome workout
customer_reviews.text: I've been a personal trainer for 15 years and these are fantastic. Its a full body workout engaging the core muscles 100% of the duration of the workout. Its great for in home personal training for clients that don't have any equipment. In addition my 2 year old daughter currently does gymnastics and with of course my supervision and spotting loves holding herself up and swinging on them.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Junk buckles
customer_reviews.text: The buckles both broke. Had to return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: David Kimbell

customer_reviews.title: They hold nicely. And I haven’t fallen yet lol
customer_reviews.text: Work really well. I put them on my pull up bar that goes on the door frame. They hold nicely. And I haven’t fallen yet lol. They have large straps so they can be hung very high if needed. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea

product_meta.title: Elite Gymnastic Rings - Our Suspension Trainer has Trustworthy Buckles and Straps - Includes 2 Non-Slip Textured Gymnastics Rings - Very Reliable Gymnastic Equipment for Adults or Kids
product_meta.description:
Elite Gym Rings

Want to tone your core and build your arm, back and chest muscles? Elite Sportz Equipment Gym Rings can help you get the results you desire.

Elite Gym rings are a pair of 9.25-inch rings with 7-inch internal diameters. With the included 15-foot straps, you can use the rings for a seemingly endless
number of exercises, including push-ups, chin-ups and dips.

- STRONGER. We use sturdy polycarbonate plastic for no-bend, no-buckle strength.
- SLIP PROOF. Our straps stay in place to give you the support you need. 
- EASIER TO USE. You can get our gym rings set up in no time with the easy-to-follow instructions. 
- MOBILE and Versatile and takes 5 minutes to set up. 
- No Muscle Spared in Each Workout 
- Includes a bonus skipping rope.

- Online videos on how to set up and best use your Gym Rings are provided by Elite Sportz Equipment. The link is on the packaging and instructions. 

Elite Sportz Equipment has a 100% Satisfaction and Lifetime Replacement Warranty if your not completely happy or the product ever breaks.
In the event of your product breaking or you're unhappy please contact Elite Sportz Equipment through your order and we will assist you.
feature_bullets: HIGHLY RATED AND HIGHLY DURABLE SUSPENSION TRAINER, the elite sportz suspension trainer is ready for anything you throw at them. highly rated gymnastics rings and highly durable workout ring

OUR PULL UP RINGS ARE NON SLIP , outdoor olympic rings need to be textured like ours to be highly effective. A smooth exercise ring just won’t cut it for this type of workout. textured gymnastics rings are a must for anyone using these in their home gym or for the kids exercise equipment

QUALITY BUCKLES AND NON SLIP STRAPS, the elite rings for crossfit are a quick set-up. Once you thread our pro straps correctly through our solid buckles, you’re ready to go. do all your workouts with rings with confidence, no need to be concerned about faulty buckles and slipping straps

ACCESS TO INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEO TRAINING, so we know you’re doing your fitness rings correctly, we have provided some great “how to videos” on our website (URL on packaging) for those that need some extra instruction. doing them correctly will help you to focus your efforts on hitting whatever muscle group your’e working and increase the range of motion so you get a better "stretch" during extension
OUR PROMISE – We stand by and believe in our products! If you have any problems, contact us and we will offer you a full refund or replacement!
